mapper.select: SELECT a.semi_lot , semi_use_yn(semi_lot) use_yn , a.prod_code , b.prod_name , a.semi_in_amt , a.emp_code , a.prcs_ing_code , c.emp_name , a.semi_ind , a.semi_exd FROM semi_in a JOIN com_prod b ON(a.prod_code = b.prod_code) LEFT JOIN com_emp c ON(a.emp_code = c.emp_code) ORDER BY a.semi_ind
SELECT prod_code , prod_name FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'S' ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT prod_code , prod_name FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'S'
AND prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
ORDER BY prod_code

SELECT a.prcs_ing_code , c.mp_code prod_code , c.prod_name , a.test_amt , a.test_date FROM prod_quality a JOIN prcs_ing b ON (a.prcs_ing_code = b.prcs_ing_code) JOIN v_semi_all c ON (b.prod_code = c.prod_code AND b.prcs_code = c.prcs_code) LEFT JOIN semi_in d ON (a.prcs_ing_code = d.prcs_ing_code) WHERE d.prcs_ing_code IS NULL AND a.total_test_yn = 'Y' AND a.test_semi_yn = 'S' ORDER BY a.test_date
SELECT a.prcs_ing_code , a.prod_code , c.prod_name , a.test_amt , a.test_date FROM prod_quality a LEFT JOIN com_prod c ON(a.prod_code = c.prod_code) WHERE a.prcs_ing_code = #{prcsIngCode}
